Package model

Class WordleBackend

java.lang.Object
model.WordleObservable
model.WordleBackend
public class WordleBackend extends WordleObservable
The model for the Wordle game. Keeps track of the account, who is logged in, the current puzzle, and other aspects necessary to run the game. This also runs the logic behind the Wordle game (for example, receiving messages from Puzzles).
Since:
April 9, 2023
